name: @nickgdev/couch-gag-common-lib
description: common utils and types for couch-gag-server & couch-gag-website
author: NickGDev

scripts.post-build: cp README.md lib/ && cp public/styles/heller.css lib/
scripts.prepare-publish: echo "cleaning..." && yarn clean && echo "installing clean deps..." && yarn && echo "formatting..." && yarn fmt && echo "building..." && yarn build && echo "copying readme..." && yarn post-build && echo "done!"
